title: Training-free Deep Concept Injection Enables Language Models for Video Question Answering
details: X Lin, M Li, R Zemel, H Ji, SF Chang - Proceedings of the 2024 Conference on …, 2024
abstract: Recently, enabling pretrained language models (PLMs) to perform zero-shot crossmodal tasks such as video question answering has been extensively studied. A popular approach is to learn a projection network that projects visual features into the …
